flavorText: The physical pain was nothing compared to the agony in his mind.

foreignData.flavorText: Die körperlichen Schmerzen waren nichts im Vergleich zu den Qualen, die sein Verstand durchlebte.
foreignData.name: Gegenbefehl
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Sein Beherrscher legt die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: El dolor físico no era nada comparado con la agonía de su mente.
foreignData.name: Contraorden
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Su controlador pone las cuatro primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: La douleur physique n'était rien comparée à la souffrance dans son esprit.
foreignData.name: Contrordre
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Son contrôleur met les quatre cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Il dolore fisico era nulla a confronto dell'agonia nella sua mente.
foreignData.name: Contrordine
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Il suo controllore mette nel suo cimitero le prime quattro carte del suo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 精神を苛む苦痛は、肉体的な苦痛の比ではなかった。
foreignData.name: 撤回命令
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。それのコントローラーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: 그가 겪는 정신적 고통에 비하면 육체의 고통은 아무것도 아니었다.
foreignData.name: 철회
foreignData.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 그 주문의 조종자는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A dor física não era nada comparada à agonia em sua mente.
foreignData.name: Contra-ordem
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Seu controlador coloca os quatro cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: Физическая боль не шла ни в какое сравнение с агонией, что разрывала его разум.
foreignData.name: Контрприказ
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Контролирующий его игрок кладет четыре верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 肉体的疼痛远远比不上心灵的创痛。
foreignData.name: 勒令撤销
foreignData.text: 反击目标咒语。其操控者将其牌库顶的四张牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignData.flavorText: 肉體的疼痛遠遠比不上心靈的創痛。
foreignData.name: 勒令撤銷
foreignData.text: 反擊目標咒語。其操控者將其牌庫頂的四張牌置入其墳墓場。

name: Countermand
originalText: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: If the target spell is an illegal target when Countermand tries to resolve, Countermand won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. The target's controller won't put any cards from the top of their library into their graveyard.

You may target a spell that can't be countered with Countermand. If you do, when Countermand resolves, the target spell won't be countered, but its controller will still put the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills four cards.
